__e: In what you've done and what you've failed to do.
! Aren't you sorry for all you did, for all you failed to do for me? !
No, what you didn't see, what you failed to see is the man I really am, right in front of you the whole time.
I can belive you said you said you failed with me.
I know what I said last night, but, Henry, you didn't fail me.
My father failed, just as your man here failed you.
But he is a god, and if you fail him, by sparing even one enemy's life that was yours, he will know.
You told the truth about what you and your sister saw as kids, and the system failed you.
Just 'cause your dad bailed doesn't mean you will.
What we're saying is, "The war on drugs has failed and here's something that might work better."
no, you didn't, and neither did they, and there is a part of you that still knows that.
And I'm sure my voice was cracking and everything else, and I said, "Nick, this is the most important day of my life."
As expected, you failed in your promise. You failed in your quest.
Not only did you fail in your mission, but you failed to report to me that the President was spending the night with her... the same night...
He failed last time, you have no reason to ask him do it again.
Whatever it is, you failed the test.
Didn't I tell you not to open the door for anybody, except your mother and I? Oh, God!
Two days ago, you failed a security test.
you just got dumped by your girlfriend; you flunked out of the army; and the real truth is I just took pity on you.
Does he lose his standing in the human race because he broke on that one last day?
Didn't I tell you not to open the door for anybody, except your mother and I? Oh, God!
